songClip 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Make howler UI for use in audio_playpack_ui

make_howler_ui.Rd

Make howler UI for use in audio_playpack_ui

make_howler_ui(
  files,
  howler_id = "howler",
  seek_ping_rate = 100,
  include_current_track = TRUE,
  width = NULL,
  options = list(),
  ...
)

Arguments

files

Files that will be used in the player.

howler_id

ID to correspond to the howler object and its related buttons.

seek_ping_rate

Number of milliseconds between each update of input${id}_seek while playing. Default is set to 1000. If set to 0, then input${id}_seek will not exist. Decreasing this number too much could increase the cross-talk between the server and client to the point where significant lags occur.

include_current_track

Logical, should the current track be included in the UI of the module?

width

Width (in pixels) of the player. Defaults to 300px.

Contents

Developed by Kyle Barrett, Ashley Baldry, James Simpson.
